contentrichtext.text: {{DISPLAYTITLE:Xi<sup>2</sup> Canis Majoris}} {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} :''For other star systems with this [[Bayer designation]], see [[Xi Canis Majoris]].'' {{Starbox short | name=ξ<sup>2</sup> Canis Majoris | epoch=[[J2000.0]] | constell=[[Canis Major]] | ra=06<sup>h</sup> 35<sup>m</sup> 03.4<sup>s</sup> | dec=−22° 57′ 53″ | spectral=A0V | appmag_v=+4.54 | dist_ly=412 ± 32 | dist_pc=126 ± 10 | names=5 Canis Majoris, [[Harvard Revised catalogue|HR]] 2414, [[Henry Draper Catalogue|HD]] 46933, [[Bonner Durchmusterung|BD]]  −22° 1458, [[Fifth Fundamental Catalogue|FK5]] 249, [[Hipparcos catalogue|HIP]] 31416, [[Smithsonian Astrophysical Observatory catalogue|SAO]] 171982, GC 8577 }} '''Xi<sup>2</sup> Canis Majoris''' (ξ<sup>2</sup> CMa, ξ<sup>2</sup> Canis Majoris) is a [[star]] in the [[constellation]] [[Canis Major]]. ξ<sup>2</sup> Canis Majoris is a white [[stellar classification|A-type]] [[main sequence|main sequence dwarf]] with an [[apparent magnitude]] of +4.54. It is approximately 412 [[light years]] from [[Earth]]. {{Stars of Canis Major}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xi2 Canis Majoris}} [[Category:Bayer objects|Canis Majoris, Xi2]] [[Category:Canis Major (constellation)]] [[Category:A-type main-sequence stars]] {{Main-star-stub}}
